name: KillerCuties
description:
This is a 3rd person multiplayer shooter concept I have been working on. 
You can choose your character from a selection of 5 different animals. 


There is still some TODO 

Need to add ammunition pickups and a multi weapon loadout system

but the multiplayer has been kind of fun to figure out. Thought I would let others play with it. 

you can find project status here

https://trello.com/b/BFOXs8wW/stupidgame
